attributes.action: FORCE SKY AND VIRGIN MEDIA TO AGREE TO REINSTATE ALL THE CHANNELS LOST BY 3.3 MILLION CUSTOMERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
3.3 Million customers of Virgin Media [Formerly NTL/Telewest] have found themselves staring at blank screens as two companies are having a playgroud tantrum at the expense of 3.3 million Virgin Media customers.

Virgin Media customers have lost SKY 1 & 2 SKY NEWS & SKY SPORTS NEWS and are having to pay the same amount for less channels on the promise of some ON DEMAND shows arriving in the future.

It is unjust for 3.3 million customers to be caught in this corporate fight beteenn two billionaires when all we want is what we have paid for.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
